meanings.sent1: The dirty socks left a ughs smell in the room.
meanings.sent2: She made an ughs face when she saw the mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The ughs look on his face when he tasted the bitter medicine was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The ughs expression on her face could not hide her disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The ughs feeling of stepping on a slug made her shudder.

meanings.definition: A sound made to express disgust or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: The loud ughs from the audience showed their disapproval.
meanings.sent2: She let out an ughs when she saw the long line at the store.
meanings.sent3: The ughs of the baby after tasting the new food were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The ughs of the old car engine signaled trouble ahead.
meanings.sent5: The ughs of the cat when given a bath could be heard throughout the house.
